overview: Marc J. La Magna brings over eighteen years of investment experience to Turnstone Capital. Marc focuses on the firm’s investments in media & entertainment and clean technology. Marc represents Turnstone as a board member of clean tech solar start-up Morgan Solar and media software company TitanTV Media. Marc is also a co-founder and Chairman of the firm’s controlled platform operating companies Turnstone Financial Services and Turnstone Environmental Technologies. Marc is an active member of the Investment Committee for Cedar Lane Asset Management LLC, an affiliated investment fund focused on the entertainment sector.
